# Project Intake Questionnaire

**Vanguard Class  New Project Discovery**

---

## Instructions

Please answer each question as completely as you can. Brief answers are fine  we will expand during our discovery session. Skip any that don't apply.

---

**2.1** Who is the primary user? (You, your team, customers, public?)

> 

**2.2** Will there be different types of users with different permissions?

> [ ] No, just one type
> [ ] Yes (describe below)

> 

**2.3** What is the user's technical comfort level?

> [ ] Non-technical (simple as possible)
> [ ] Comfortable with apps
> [ ] Technical (can handle complexity)
